name: On a Roll
description: Experience the adrenaline of performing insane stunts, getting big airs, grinding and bombing hills with the only inline skating game available: On a Roll. It has everything sport sim fans love and includes a replay editor, skatepark builder, open world and lots more.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 740 / Radeon R7 260X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: A game controller is required to play the game
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 3 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: A game controller is required to play the game
